name: 梁又文
objective:
本課程教學內容以數位製造的軟硬體整合實務操作主。每次的課程主題前半段會以理論教學為主，使用教師自製PPT與講義授課，接續請學生發展禮品或商品之設計概念草圖，輔以數位製造軟體做為概念數位化之應用；後半段課程則是以實際操作為主，會帶領同學使用數位製造之相關工具，將數位化的設計資料進行產出，進而完成實體的產品。本課程期望透過理論與實作結合，將所學落實學以致用。
In the course, we focus on software and hardware integration practices teaching Digital manufacturing. In the first part, each of the course will conduct the theoretical teaching by utilizing the PPT and handouts to teach, and then ask students to develop design sketches for the concept of gifts or merchandise by digital manufacturing software. In the second part, the course is based on actual operations and will lead students to use digital manufacturing tools to produce the products from digital design data. We expect to apply a combination of theory and practice, further help students to complete the product by digital manufacturing tools.
